Text:
crashes after initial loading sequence.
installed as admin, ran game as admin, tried all compatibility settings
win8-64
Thanks Duck! You always have great uploads. To those that get a startup crash, it's not the upload, it's the actual game.

Possible solutions

1. switching from 8CH to 2CH (worked for me)
2. Editing CommonSettings.pro and changing the setting "isFullscreen" to "False" did the trick for me as well, and turning off Vsync never hurts.
3. Updating video card drivers / .NET might help as well
